item.title: Hugo & Markdown
item.description: 0. Hugo & Markdown Hugo && MarkDown 1. MarkDown template --- title: "{{ replace .Name "-" " " | title }}" date: {{ .Date }} lastmod: {{ .Date }} draft: false tags: [ ] categories: [ ] comment: true --- 2. Hugo command hugo #build html havn't draft=true hugo -D #build html and dragt=true hugo server #Start hugo server 3. Other Reference
